name: City School Bus Driver 3D
description:
The school summer holiday is over!
Yeah kids school is starting again, the summer holidays are over so time again to get into that famous yellow school bus. And if you get bored and the journey takes to long and you have a feeling you can do a better job then the bus driver. Then download City School Bus Driver 3D the newest schoolbus driving 3D simulator VascoGames.

Love school bus pick up driving games
This is newest bus driving simulator will put you in the seat of these big vehicles. You don’t need any special driving license to drive this big school bus around in this beautiful designed big city. The goal in this game is of course to get the students from their home in time at the school. So if you love school bus pick up driving games you should definitely try this game. Picking them up and bring them to school sounds easy right, well think again you need to hurry and get the kids in time at the school but you need to watch the traffic. Take care you don’t smash your school bus during driving into any other vehicles on the road.

Keep your school bus under control!
Driving these big busses is not so easy as you may think. You need to perform some maneuvers to not hit anything or anyone on the road. You need to use your on screen controls to stay clear of the dangers that you may encounter on your pickup driving missions. In this game you are the school bus driver and its up to you to get the students of this great 3D city save into school. So get ready for a super sweet gig driver, all you need to do is pick up kids, and stay cool when the traffic starts jamming. City School Bus Driver 3D is a Schoolbus driving 3D simulator game for everyone that would like to keep those driving skills up to date, you need to practice everything from parking, reversing and use your mental skills to keep calm.

City School Bus Driver 3D - Game Features
- Realistic schoolbus driving 3D simulator physics
- Traffic on the streets you need to watch
- Interior Camera, for the hard parking missions
- Lots of different parking and 3D driving situations, learn the ropes of being a real bus driver
- Experience the smooth gameplay of this free driving simulator
- Exciting 3D graphics drive around in a huge city

We hope you will enjoy this Schoolbus driving 3D simulator a new parking and free driving game and drive safely. Please give use some support by rating our game or by liking our Facebook page or you can follow us on twitter!
